title: 9 Killed and 25 Injured in Shootings at School and Home in British Columbia
summary_full: Police say the suspected shooter died of a self-inflicted injury after the shooting in Tumbler Ridge, a remote community.
summary_public: Police say the suspected shooter died of a self-inflicted injury after the shooting in Tumbler Ridge, a remote community.
